cab.content: " ' . 1 ' kn / I*P 16IU " '(THIS DOCUMENT IS THE PROPERTY OP HIS BRITANNIC MAJESTY1S GOVERNMENT)* SEC RgJT.,. \ ^C*P*&430, - - -""- CABINET.TURKISH ACTIVITIES ,jN, KURDISTAN.Paraphrase Telegram from-the High Commissions?? of Iraq to the Secretary Of State for the Colonies, (Received Colonial Office 6*15 p.me - 16th October./1921).(CIRCULATED BY THE SECRETARY OP STATE FOR THE COLONIESo)- -'No. 585 dated 15th October.Secrete . I forward the following for your Information,and that.Of Bray begins. Vice-Consul Warren at Kermanshah was informed a few days ago by Sharif Dowleh late Governor General of Persian Kurdistan that Turkish:nationalists* -are endeavouring to raise an army in North Kurdistan,, Caucasus, or Persian,Kurdistan with object of overthrowing;, all European influence in East. Army is to be called Army of Islam, and. support from Mahometans, of India and Mesopotamia is reckoned on by Party. (Ends)*COX.2S Whitehall Gardens, S.W* , 18th October, 1921.
